price: Yεkaa sε: ”Egya, yε nwunu ne asomdwoeε ma Abraham “.
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
